name: Arrhythmus
description:
A short game I made for LD49 Compo

Times are dark and your life has never been more filled with anxiety. Your sanity is only kept stable by sheer street lights. The way they blink, leaving a sheer chilling second of unknow and unnearthy feeling is weighing down your heart, it can only hold so much.

Controls:

WASD to move, hold E to fix street lights.

Play in Fullscreen only with sound enabled :) Hope you enjoy
